statements: SELECT * FROM WasteManagement;
SELECT id, waste_type FROM WasteManagement;
SELECT * FROM WasteManagement WHERE disposal_method = 'Landfill';
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM WasteManagement;
SELECT AVG(id) FROM WasteManagement;
SELECT waste_type, COUNT(*) FROM WasteManagement GROUP BY waste_type;
SELECT * FROM WasteManagement ORDER BY disposal_method;
SELECT * FROM WasteManagement WHERE waste_type LIKE 'Plastic%';
SELECT * FROM WasteManagement WHERE disposal_method IN ('Recycling', 'Incineration');
SELECT * FROM WasteManagement WHERE disposal_location = 'Waste Facility A';
SELECT id, disposal_method, disposal_location FROM WasteManagement WHERE waste_type = 'Paper';
SELECT * FROM WasteManagement WHERE id = 10;
SELECT * FROM WasteManagement WHERE id > 15;
SELECT * FROM WasteManagement WHERE id BETWEEN 5 AND 10;
SELECT * FROM WasteManagement WHERE id < 5 OR id > 15;
SELECT * FROM WasteManagement WHERE waste_type <> 'Glass';
SELECT * FROM WasteManagement WHERE disposal_method IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM WasteManagement WHERE disposal_location IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM WasteManagement LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM WasteManagement OFFSET 5;
SELECT * FROM waste_collection;
SELECT id, location FROM waste_collection WHERE collection_date = '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM waste_disposal;
SELECT id, location FROM waste_disposal WHERE disposal_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT location, collection_date FROM waste_collection WHERE location = 'London';
SELECT * FROM waste_disposal WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT id, disposal_date FROM waste_disposal WHERE id = 5;
SELECT * FROM waste_collection WHERE collection_date < '2022-12-31';
SELECT id, location FROM waste_disposal WHERE disposal_date > '2022-06-30';
SELECT location, disposal_date FROM waste_disposal WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT id, location FROM waste_collection WHERE collection_date = '2022-10-15';
SELECT * FROM waste_disposal WHERE location = 'Paris';
SELECT id, disposal_date FROM waste_disposal WHERE disposal_date < '2022-09-30';
SELECT * FROM waste_collection WHERE location = 'Sydney';
SELECT id, location, collection_date, disposal_date FROM waste_collection JOIN waste_disposal ON waste_collection.id = waste_disposal.id;
SELECT * FROM waste_collection WHERE location LIKE 'S%';
SELECT id, location FROM waste_disposal WHERE disposal_date between '2022-04-01' and '2022-06-30';
SELECT location, disposal_date FROM waste_disposal WHERE disposal_date = (SELECT MAX(disposal_date) FROM waste_disposal);
SELECT id, location FROM waste_collection WHERE collection_date = (SELECT MIN(collection_date) FROM waste_collection);
SELECT * FROM waste_disposal ORDER BY disposal_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM WasteCollection WHERE collection_date = '2021-10-10';
SELECT * FROM WasteCollection WHERE location_id = 100;
SELECT collection_id, collection_date FROM WasteCollection WHERE collected_weight > 50;
SELECT SUM(collected_weight) AS total_weight FROM WasteCollection;
SELECT * FROM WasteType WHERE type_name = 'Plastic';
SELECT * FROM WasteType WHERE type_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT disposal_date, disposal_method FROM WasteDisposal WHERE disposal_location = 200;
SELECT disposal_id FROM WasteDisposal WHERE disposal_date BETWEEN '2021-10-01' AND '2021-10-31';
SELECT disposal_location, COUNT(*) AS total_disposals FROM WasteDisposal GROUP BY disposal_location;
SELECT collection_id, collection_date, collected_weight FROM WasteCollection ORDER BY collection_date DESC;
SELECT disposal_id, disposal_date FROM WasteDisposal ORDER BY disposal_date ASC;
SELECT collection_id, collection_date, location_id, collected_weight FROM WasteCollection WHERE location_id = 300;
SELECT location_id, AVG(collected_weight) AS avg_weight FROM WasteCollection GROUP BY location_id;
SELECT type_id, type_name FROM WasteType ORDER BY type_id DESC;
SELECT MAX(collection_date) AS latest_collection FROM WasteCollection;
SELECT MIN(disposal_date) AS earliest_disposal FROM WasteDisposal;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_collections FROM WasteCollection;
SELECT disposal_id, disposal_location, disposal_method FROM WasteDisposal WHERE disposal_method = 'Landfill';
SELECT * FROM WasteCollection WHERE collection_id = 500;
SELECT collection_id, collection_date, collected_weight FROM WasteCollection WHERE collected_weight < 10;
SELECT * FROM waste_collection
SELECT collection_id, collection_date, collection_location FROM waste_collection
SELECT * FROM waste_bins
SELECT bin_id, bin_location, bin_capacity FROM waste_bins
SELECT * FROM waste_disposal
SELECT disposal_id, disposal_location, disposal_date FROM waste_disposal
SELECT * FROM waste_recycling
SELECT recycle_id, recycle_date, recycle_location FROM waste_recycling
SELECT collection_location, collection_weight FROM waste_collection WHERE collection_weight > 100
SELECT bin_location, bin_capacity FROM waste_bins WHERE bin_capacity < 50
SELECT disposal_location, disposed_weight FROM waste_disposal WHERE disposed_weight < 200
SELECT recycle_location, recycled_weight FROM waste_recycling WHERE recycled_weight > 50
SELECT collection_id, collection_date, collection_location FROM waste_collection WHERE collection_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT bin_id, bin_location, bin_status FROM waste_bins WHERE bin_status = 'Full'
SELECT disposal_id, disposal_location FROM waste_disposal WHERE disposal_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT recycle_id, recycle_date, recycled_weight FROM waste_recycling WHERE recycle_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT collection_location, SUM(collection_weight) AS total_weight FROM waste_collection GROUP BY collection_location
SELECT bin_location, AVG(bin_capacity) AS average_capacity FROM waste_bins GROUP BY bin_location
SELECT disposal_location, MAX(disposed_weight) AS max_disposed_weight FROM waste_disposal GROUP BY disposal_location
SELECT recycle_location, MIN(recycled_weight) AS min_recycled_weight FROM waste_recycling GROUP BY recycle_location
SELECT * FROM waste_collection_locations;
SELECT location_name, location_address FROM waste_collection_locations;
SELECT schedule_id, collection_time FROM waste_collection_schedule;
SELECT * FROM waste_bin_types;
SELECT bin_type_name, capacity FROM waste_bin_types;
SELECT bin_id, location_id FROM waste_bins;
SELECT bin_id, last_collection_date FROM waste_bins;
SELECT collection_id, bin_id FROM waste_collection_history;
SELECT collection_id, collection_date FROM waste_collection_history;
SELECT location_name, location_address, collection_day FROM waste_collection_locations;
SELECT schedule_id, location_id, collection_time FROM waste_collection_schedule;
SELECT bin_id, bin_type_id, location_id FROM waste_bins;
SELECT collection_id, bin_id, collection_date FROM waste_collection_history;
SELECT * FROM waste_collection_locations WHERE location_name='ABC';
SELECT * FROM waste_collection_schedule WHERE collection_time > '12:00:00';
SELECT * FROM waste_bin_types WHERE capacity >= 100;
SELECT * FROM waste_bins WHERE is_full = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM waste_collection_history WHERE collection_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT location_name, location_address FROM waste_collection_locations WHERE collection_day='Monday';
